FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Echo of the MSG-ID field from the Archive Mnemonic Value Request message.

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE-STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the status of the Archive Mnemonic Value Request Message that was processed. (1: Acknowledgement, 2: Working/Keep Alive, 3: Successful Completion, 4: Failed Completion, 5: Invalid Request, 6: Final Message

FIELD.NAME: TIME-COMPLETED
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time application completed processing the request

FIELD.NAME: RETURN-VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Return value or status based on the RESPONSE-STATUS. Useful to provide function call status or error code in the case of failed completion

FIELD.NAME: PROD-NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the product.

FIELD.NAME: PROD-DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the product in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: PROD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Product type and subtype being requested. (See Table 4-29. Product Categories... Value is AAA: Archive and Assessment)

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-PROD-SUBTYPES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of further delineations / categories beyond the product subtype. Also, used as msg subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. in Product Message.

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: PROD-SUBTYPE.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: First subcategory of the product subtype. (Subject elements ME5, ME6, etc. of the Product Message)

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: URI
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URI specifying the location where the (single) output file product is stored

FIELD.NAME: NAME-PATTERN
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the name of the output file

FIELD.NAME: DESCRIPTION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Description of the file in text or xml

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Describes the file format

FIELD.NAME: VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the version of the file

FIELD.NAME: SIZE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Actual size of the file

FIELD.NAME: DATA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The file content

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-MNEMONICS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Total number of mnemonics returned

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-START
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the start of an array of object fields

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the 1st mnemonic

FIELD.NAME: MNEMONIC.n.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Status of the 1st mnemonic: valid mnemonic or valid mnemonic with no data or invalid mnemonic (1: Valid, 2: Valid, Nodata, 3: Invalid

FIELD.NAME: ARRAY-END
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Control field indicating the end of an array of object fields
